### Resource Creation

```hcl
resource "intersight_iam_certificate" "iam_certificate1" {
  certificate {
      pem_certificate = var.pemcertificate1
	}
}


variable "pemcertificate1" {
  type        = string
  sensitive   = true
  description = "Pem certificate base64 encoded value"
  default     = ""
}
```
